name: Superior_Attuned_Superior_Will_of_the_Controller_A
display_name: Superior Attuned Superior Will of the Controller A
display_fullname: Boosts.Superior Attuned Will of the Controller A
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, enhances the hold duration of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Mez.Scale}%, the hold duration by {Boost.Attrib.Mez.Scale}%, the immobilization duration by {Boost.Attrib.Mez.Scale}%, the sleep duration by {Boost.Attrib.Mez.Scale}%, the fear duration by {Boost.Attrib.Mez.Scale}% and the confuse duration by {Boost.Attrib.Mez.Scale}%. This enhancement can only be slotted by Controllers and may be slotted into most control powers and requires the user to be level 50.
display_short_help: Set: Superior Will of the Controller
power_display_names: Superior Will of the Controller: Accuracy/Control Duration
